title: Medication Management Quality and Safety Education for Disabled Residential Facilities: Modular Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Establishing hands-on environments using VR devices and tablets, with scenario-based learning closely tied to real-world contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can perform a 5-step quality verification process for medication error prevention in VR simulation with 90% accuracy
Learners can design medication communication protocols tailored to individuals with disabilities based on real-world case studies
Learners can complete the medication reconciliation procedure in team-based simulation with an error rate below 10%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
